original_text: “If among you, one of your brothers should become poor, in any of your towns within your land that the Lord your God is giving you, you shall not harden your heart or shut your hand against your poor brother,
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주신 땅 어느 성읍에서든지 가난한 형제가 너와 함께 거주하거든 그 가난한 형제에게 네 마음을 완악하게 하지 말며 네 손을 움켜 쥐지 말고

sentences.original_text: If among you, one of your brothers should become poor,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 너희 중에 네 형제 중 하나가 가난하게 되면,

sentences.original_text: in any of your towns within your land,
that the Lord your God is giving you,
you shall not harden your heart
or shut your hand against your poor brother,
sentences.korean_translation: 네 가난한 형제에게 손을 닫지 말라
